Question: Shenzhen Maxtang Computer Co. Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Maxtang/Shenzhen Datang Computer Co. Ltd.

Product: Maxtang MTN-FP750 mini PC

- AMD Ryzen 7 7735HS processor
- Windows 11 Pro
- Compact form factor
- High-speed memory
- Versatile connectivity
- Durable design
- Suitable for 4K and 8K applications
